extent.charseq: the more talented of the two
the one who has a child by Colin Firth
a bloated alcoholic sexpot who'd spent way too much time on the barstool
the better actor of the two
you who have been asking how TALL she is
Well, for the longest time this was a topic she and her sister Jennifer seemed to avoid, but a few months back, Jennifer announced to the world that their father is Chinese

ldc_scope.charseq: I was researching Meg Tilly on the internet and thus accidentally found out that Jennifer Tilly was born Jennifer Chan
